Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Food was delicious. Wish there were more meat on the plates though. Almost too many veggies for the portion of meats you get. Food tasted great though and staff were friendly

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Great Vietnamese in leominster!  The chicken pho is very good and the pad Thai is some of the best in the area.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Delicious Pho, broth is perfect, plentiful noodles... the Wonton soup is just ok. Ambiance inside is good.... the Servers are quick and welcoming.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: A good spot for sure! The beef pho and fried egg rolls are worth dropping in all by themself. Good service and the place was clean too.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: The vermicelli dish was great but the shrimp and pork spring roll was only lettuce and noodles in rice paper.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Tried take out for the first time tonight and it was SO GOOD!!! Our new favorite place! Pad Thai was the best I‚Äôve ever had.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Second time to this place few years apart.still good food and great service.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Quick and efficient and super good! The sauces and herbs which make Vietnamese food so unique and flavorful are not skimped on here! Perhaps the best Vietnamese around!

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: I have been eating here for over 10 years. This place is Awesome! Excellant food and service. Everything on the menu is Great!

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Loved the food! Will definitely go back! Highly recommend this place! üëå

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Just a great hole in the wall. The Chicken Pho is a staple. Always fresh and taste great give it a shot y'all.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Food is delicious. I come here once every other week and have a bowl of beef pho and the shrimp/pork spring rolls. Yummy!

Name: The Taste of Vietnam

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: I keep giving it a chance, the broth in the pho was better years ago. Now it is flavorless and tastes like tap water. The broth is the most important part. So disappointed

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: A taste of Vietnam is a great restaurant with fantastic service. I got a super kind and welcoming waitress named Caitlin, she was very alert and always there when we needed something. I had the egg rolls which were very tasty and I would definitely recommend them. A great restaurant with great food and service.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: It's was ok. Next time I will dine in

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Amazing food. Consistent, delicious, good service, just all around great!

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Amazing food and excellent service.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Got to love T.O.V always good after a long night of drinking. Also very addictive, sometimes I find myself craving the food all the time.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text:
I had the Pho Dac Biet.
The broth was on the sweet side and had a lemon taste.
There was no tendon. It was my fault for not reading the ingredient list. I was just expecting it to be included.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Fresh and tasty! Spicy basil stir fry with chicken was spicy but very good!

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: The best place to eat. I love it. üçúüçú

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Most critical is my relationship with Hang, the CEO/owner. I have known her since she opened the restaurant. She is an industrious entrepreneur whose drive and ambition has created a restaurant of good, arguably great reputation. The ‚Ä¶

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: My boyfriend and I order beef pho from here probably every weekend üòÇüòÇ it‚Äôs delicious and the staff is always so sweet! Definitely one of my favorite Asian restaurants in the area for sure! Worth a try!!

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: My family favorite place to eat Asian food is their.I been their since day one.The pho is great.Thank you Toni.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: We used to love this restaurant. We‚Äôd go regularly. We noticed the owner was not very friendly. Then the quality of the food slipped, and we saw the owner less and less. The last three times we went prior to Covid the whole family agreed-we ‚Ä¶

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Place is nice, service good. Problem I had was tiny portion of food for the price.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Delicious pho and appetizers, lunch specials are pretty good too. Even the house-made drinks and ice creams are noteworthy. My go-to for Vietnamese cuisine in the area.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: A nice little place set off a main street. The fried egg rolls are amazing, flaky and fresh. The PO  soup is always great. Good value portions. The only negative is that the meatballs are a touch bland but the stock is the best I've ever had. I'll be back.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Pho is good, cost is good, waiters are friendly, and it's a nice small cozy feel.  Nice experience

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: I‚Äôve been here twice, couldn‚Äôt help get the beef pho again. Fresh spring rolls, crispy shrimp rolls crispy and tofu noodles with beef were all v good too. Friendly staff, no frills decor, clean. Worth the 20 minute drive. Will come back.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: This was a new discovery for me. Went with a friend and we really enjoyed it. She had pet died and I had Curry. Excellent food. And our waitress was really friendly and helpful. I'm going back as soon as I can.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Was looking for something to eat near Great Wolf Lodge & found this place on Google. Reviews looked good. Decided to try it out. Food was decent & prices were fair. Can't say I was expecting amazing Vietnamese food in the middle of ‚Ä¶

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Absolutely delicious. The servers are great and make sure everything is great and the pho is probably the best I have had. Very flavorful and they give you plenty of bean sprouts. The chicken pho was my favorite!

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: My favorite place to eat in Leominster. Really fast with take-out too. Ive been going there for years and they have NEVER let me down.  Amazingly consistent with quality of food and service. Do get the fresh veggie rolls--the best Ive had anywhere.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Came from out of town and thoroughly enjoyed the experience. Friendly staff, clean facility and tasty food.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: This experience was very good. Good food and clean.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Well, for one of the few Vietnamese restaurants around here, it's not horrific. Lowell has much better pho than here, more flavorful and better portions. But for a quick fix, not bad. I just prefer to drive an extra 25 minutes to go eat well, because good food makes me happy

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Serious lack of flavor, no authenticity to food. This is not the taste of Vietnam.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Fresh and authentic Vietnamese food! We love everything here. The crispy eggplant, the ginger duck, and the pho are just incredible. What an amazing chef this place has with a very subtle and personal touch! And the service is absolutely perfect.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: So delicious!! The Canh Chua was amazing! The pork vermicelli was completely unbelievable! I was not expecting the traditional pork in there. So tender and so delicious!!! I love everything about this place. So cozy. Very friendly. The staff is wonderful. I hope the best for them always and on my adventures I will return.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text:
Happened upon this restaurant trying to find a quick lunch.
At first glance, in a strip mall, my expectations were not high.
The crispy eggplant appetizer was excellent! ‚Ä¶

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Pretty solid, quick food.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: cannot say enough good things about this place! i eat here regularly and never am disappointed. tonight i had a particularly satisfying dish of the spicy beef with basil sauce. it was delectable! clean environment, fresh ingredients, delicious meals, great prices. you can't go wrong

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: I read these crazy reviews that these people write of how good this place is and I was like I never see a restaurant with so many reviews and the lowest rating is a 3 star.  And after I ate there.  I knew it is a quality restaurant.  The ‚Ä¶

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Was delicious  will eat here again for sure.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Always friendly whether sitting to eat or taking to go, very tidy and cozy dining room. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: If I could give this a negative score I would. The pho was terrible. The broth was greasy and just tasted absolutely horrible. I guess the spring rolls weren't too bad but my friend had ordered a sparkling lemonade and I ordered a regular one. We both got sparkling which tasted weird. Overall crappy experience and will not be returning

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Really liked their crispy eggplant. It had a nice sweet savory flavor. I followed this up with their beef pho. Thin succulent slices of beef in a flavorful broth. Have it with basil and jalape√±os, will make your day. Fast and friendly service. Overall a very enjoyable dinner experience.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Their muscles appetizer is my favorite, with grilled pork over rice or vermicelli.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: The food  is wonderful! We eat here @ least once a week. The Pho is great, as is everything on the menu. The food is always fresh & delicious, & the servers are very friendly & accommodating. We highly recommend them.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: The food was pretty good. We had pho and the New Zealand clam appetizer. Both tasted good. The clams were spicy, but not too much for me. The pho didn't have tripe or tendon but the broth had great flavor.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: A solid choice for pho and other Vietnamese dishes if you're in the area. Quick service and friendly staff. The spring rolls were delicious, but the pho was very average and a little bland.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: This small vietnamese is located in a little strip of stores in Leominster MA.    When I approached it I confess I was sceptical despite the good reviews I'd read.  It's definitely not a looker from the exterior.  We were not dissuaded, ‚Ä¶

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: The best Canh Chua soup I've had in a long time. The place is small but cozy and the service is excellent. My wife and I also tried the Pad Thai and it was delicious! We highly recommend this restaurant!!

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: As a vietnamese growing up in vietnam, I don‚Äôt really like the vietnamese food here that much. Maybe they adjust the recipe so food can be familiar to westerners here. I tried pho here twice, don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll try the third time unless I‚Äôm ‚Ä¶

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Best chkn noodle soup in this town!!

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Love their food, nice people

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Fast and friendly service. Food is very flavorful and delicious.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Great and wonderful place to have pho. Parking lot isn‚Äôt great but the food is good. The people who served foods are awesome as well. Everyone in there is nice. I eat there when ever I get the chance. Stop by to try some food.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: It was okay, I suppose. My companion had Pad Thai and it was good enough albeit short on shrimp. My Ph·ªü was a disappointment - the beef balls were rubbery and the broth was weak. At least the basil and bean sprouts were fresh and crisp. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: The crispy eggplant was great; the pho was only average.  It needed the meat on the side and more flavor in the broth.  But, it was inexpensive and the service was good, so I'll be back to try something non-pho.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: We go here for dinner once a month. The staff is the nicest group of people!  The food is fantastic. It can get a little loud when its packed, and the parking lot can fill up - but thats just proof of how much people enjoy A Taste of Vietnam.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Very friendly, food is always good!

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Have taken out for dinner here before and liked it, so we decided to stop for lunch. Food was fresh, delicious, and served promptly. Dining room is immaculate and the staff very professional, will go back again!

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Love this place. I haven't been here in over two years since I moved to Ohio. But I sat down, got great service just like I never left. The waitress even remembered my extra lime without me asking. Talk about a great customer IQ. Does get any better.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Food is delicious. Service is quick and personable. I have an hour for lunch and had plenty of time.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: It was a rainy day when I first visited this restaurant and the pho they serve here is the perfect dish to warm you up. Great atmosphere, reasonable prices, big portions, and awesome staff. I love the house special beef pho.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Pretty good Chinese food, which was not what I was looking for, but they don't have many traditional Vietnamese dishes on the menu. I had fried rice and my friemd had Pad Thai, which he said was good.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: The Pho was amazing! Thank you so much :)

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: I am satisfied every time I visit Taste of Vietnam.  The staff is always friendly, the food fresh and very reasonably priced and they bring a pot of green tea.  Everything I have tried on the menu has been excellent.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text:
Great food and reasonable prices.

Great service, good pandemic practices

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Always delicious soup. Very friendly environment and beautiful vibes there.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: My favorite Vietnamese restaurant. Crispy eggplant..wow! Pho is perfect. Lemon chicken on bed of rice very good ask for side of cilantro for the rice.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Consistent food.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Delicious food and attentive staff. The Pho' is a must try! The Lemongrass Chicken Wings and Crispy Calamari are also top of my list of favorites here.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: The staff was very friendly and helpful, and this was my first pho.  I had the "meatballs" and asked for less noodles and then kicked it up a notch with some spice (which I love).  The meatballs were reconstituted blah, so never again on ‚Ä¶

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Our first time getting takeout from here. Very fresh, good price, all the dishes we ordered tasted fabulous. Thank you!

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Can I give it more than 5 stars!?  Tony and Hang are masters at what they do.   The food is delicious and the staff is so friendly.   They can answer questions about dishes and even help you find something you will really like.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Great local Pho restaurant, usually stick to the #17 Beef noodle with Beef ball Pho, coupled with a salty plum drink or a espresso really makes for a great lunch or dinner. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: The best Vietnamese place in the area by a sizeable margin.  The food is excellent. The dining room is small, but calm and classy and never feels hectic.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: I absolutely love this place!   We've been going for over 10 years and have never had a bad meal!  Super kind people... I wish they were closer.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: If you don't have the wonton soup, you are honestly doing yourself a disfavor. The eggplant appetizer is to die for; we go here every single time we are in town (like once a year) it's that good.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Personally felt like the food needed more flavor loved there egg roll but that‚Äôs about it. The service was quick and staff very helpful and friendly.

Name: The Taste of Vietnam

Name: The Taste of Vietnam
Review Text: Went for Pho and it was excellent. The outside is very unassuming but inside it is nice, cozy and well kept. Service was great.

Review Text: Food okay..Had the soup and it was a little greasy. Told staff...they were receptive to feedback. Will return m

Review Text: Great food and service lunch menu is fast and everything is good. I have been a regular for lunch at least 1 or 2 times a week for the last 17 years or so.
